H0.text: Captain of the Flying Dustman, what was the name of Captain Pugwash's mortal enemy. Blackbeak Bill

H1.text: Captain of the Flying Dustman, what was the name of Captain Pugwash's mortal enemy. Captain Scarblade

H2.text: Captain of the Flying Dustman, what was the name of Captain Pugwash's mortal enemy. Barnaby Blackheart

H3.text: Captain of the Flying Dustman, what was the name of Captain Pugwash's mortal enemy. Cut-throat Jake

A4.text: His mortal enemy is Cut-Throat Jake, captain of the Flying Dustman.
